UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

Challenge.title: Challenge
Challenge.description: Represents a coding challenge for students.

description.description: A detailed description of the challenge.

language.description: The programming language for the challenge.

testCases.description: Test cases for the challenge, can be in various formats.

allowInteractiveApis.description: Whether the challenge allows interactive APIs like prompt() or alert().

createdBy.description: UID of the user who created the challenge.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the challenge was created.

ChallengeAttempt.title: Challenge Attempt
ChallengeAttempt.description: Represents a student's attempt at a challenge.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/challenges/{challengeId}.description: Stores all coding challenges created by teachers or admins.

/users/{userId}/challengeAttempts/{attem.description: Stores a student's specific attempt at a challenge.
